titles: [To the kings most excellent majesty. The humble address of your most loyal ... subjects ... of] Hereford
author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
notes: Imperfect: Sheet cropped with loss of text.
In two columns. Left is address of Hereford; right is address of city of Gloucester. Cf. National Library of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles II, 1660-1685 --  Sources.
